General.Name: Pan Malaysia Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Pan Malaysia Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the hotel business in Malaysia. The company operates Corus Paradise resort hotel in Port Dickson, Negeri Sembilan that consists of 200 rooms. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Pan Malaysia Holdings Berhad is a subsidiary of Malayan United Industries Berhad.
